title: A true and briefe relation of the famous seige of Breda beseiged, and taken in vnder the able and victorious conduct of his Highnesse the Prince of Orange, captaine generall of the States armie, and admirall of the seas, &c. Composed by Henry Hexham quartermaster to the regiment of the honorable Coronell Goring.
author: Hexham, Henry, 1585?-1650?
publicationStmtPublisher: By James Moxon, and are to be sould at [sic] Hendricus Hondius neere the gevangen Port in the Hagh,
